stepAnswer: persistent deficits in social communication and social interaction across contexts; restricted, repetitive patterns of behavior, interests, or activities
stepTitle: What are the two characteristics of autism here?
choices: persistent deficits in social communication and social interaction across contexts; restricted, repetitive patterns of behavior, interests, or activities
lack of facial expressions; lack of interest in peers
persistent deficits in social communication and social interaction across contexts;flapping of hands
restricted, repetitive patterns of behavior, interests, or activities; atypical responses to sensory input
